column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////First time to try this dipped pizza
column2: it was delicious but the line was super long. We waited almost 2h
column3: finally got a table. Ordered salad
column4: it was a great value. Good taste as well. Personally I think the pizza was too fatty
column6: prefer thin crust pizza better. Ordered a Margarita
column8: asked waitress to change to another drink
column9: in general restaurant would cross this order from the check but they didn't and didn't tell us clearly either. Well
